register.description: this is a test service for ElasTest Device Emulator Service
register.name: ElasTest Device Emulator Service

costs.description: On Demand 5 per deployment, 50 per core, 10 per GB ram and 1 per GB disk
costs.name: On Demand 5 + Charges

manifest.manifest_content:
version: '2'

services:
  eds-frontend:
   eds-memsipe:
  eds-zigbeeipe:
    image: elastest/eds-frontend
  image: elastest/eds-memsipe
    image: elastest/eds-zigbeeipe

DeviceEmulator.description: Service provides RESTful API to interact with sensors provided in EDS

DashBord.description: Service to show emulated sensor data in the form of plots

Gateway.description: Service to receive device data in JSON format with appropriate paths
